original_text: The Lord will send rain for the seeds that you have planted. The ground will give you plenty of good food. At that time, your cows will have lots of grass to eat in wide fields. The Lord will send rain for the seeds that you have planted. The ground will give you plenty of good food. At that time, your cows will have lots of grass to eat in wide fields.
korean_text: 네가 땅에 뿌린 종자에 주께서 비를 주사 땅이 먹을 것을 내며 곡식이 풍성하고 기름지게 하실 것이며 그 날에 네 가축이 광활한 목장에서 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: for the seeds that you have planted
The ground will give you plenty of good food
sentences.korean_translation: 땅은 당신에게 풍부한 좋은 음식을 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: your cows will have lots of grass to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 소들은 먹을 풍부한 풀을 가질 것입니다
